mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(),'-','') from dual
insert into flow_src (`id`, `src`, `uid`, `create_time`, `update_time`, `company`, `client_name`, `address`, `qq_no`, `email`, `mobile_no`) values (#{id},#{src},#{uid},#{createTime},#{updateTime},#{company},#{clientName}, #{address},#{qqNo},#{email},#{mobileNo})
